document_notes.text:
This update for frr fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2022-37035: Fixed a possible use-after-free due to a race condition related to bgp_notify_send_with_data() and bgp_process_packet() (bsc#1202085).
- CVE-2022-42917: Fixed a privilege escalation from frr to root in frr config creation (bsc#1204124).
document_notes.title: Details

notes.text: An issue was discovered in bgpd in FRRouting (FRR) 8.3. In bgp_notify_send_with_data() and bgp_process_packet() in bgp_packet.c, there is a possible use-after-free due to a race condition. This could lead to Remote Code Execution or Information Disclosure by sending crafted BGP packets. User interaction is not needed for exploitation.
notes.title: Vulnerability Description

notes.text: ** RESERVED ** This candidate has been reserved by an organization or individual that will use it when announcing a new security problem. When the candidate has been publicized, the details for this candidate will be provided.
